attributes.action: change firearms law in uk for my mum christine and sister lucy
attributes.additional_details:
on 23rd february 2014 my Mum and sister were stolen from me, my step dad John Lowe shot them not giving them a chance, my mum was shot once through the stomach and my beautiful sister was shot twice. The reality is this could have been prevented, my sister was 40 years old and her brain had to be removed because her injuries were horrendous. I know I'm only alive because of my brave sister. But I feel that shot gun laws in this country need to be revised the laws are out of date and this needs to be changed .
I will never get over there deaths and I will never be able to be complete I would like to see change someone please help me with a campaign to see change in the gun laws in The Uk ..
